title: Interview with Sue Palmer
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Sue Palmer, the author of Upstart, 21st century boys, 21st century girls and of course, Toxic childhood.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew interviews Sue Palmer, the author of Upstart, 21st century boys, 21st century girls and of course, Toxic childhood.
